headline: GE Vernova Stock Bounces Back. Here’s What Helping It.
summary: GE Vernova  stock was back in the green Thursday with some help from Wall Street.  The stock had closed lower the previous session, despite a better-than-expected earnings report.  Wednesday’s wild stock swings seemed to stem from investors’ concerns that things were as good as they were going to get for the stock.

headline: Dow Jones Futures Fall; Tesla Skids After Earnings, Elon Musk; Quantum Stocks Spike
summary: Dow Jones futures fell slightly Thursday, along with S&P 500 futures and Nasdaq futures. Crude oil futures spiked. Tesla fell following mixed earnings and CEO Elon Musk's comments on self-driving and the Optimus robot.

headline: This Week In Energy Transition - Innovative Financing Spurs Growth in Renewable Energy Projects
summary: Bridge Renewable Energy has secured an $80 million term loan facility to advance the construction of a 40 MW distributed solar and energy storage portfolio across nine U.S. states. This financing, arranged in partnership with Investec Bank and other financial institutions, exemplifies the type of innovative capital solutions needed to accelerate the deployment of distributed renewable energy infrastructure. The funding will support the development and operation of 42 community solar and...

headline: GE Vernova bullish on electrical infrastructure as turbine backlog grows
summary: GE Vernova is investing strategically in electrification, its fastest growing segment, despite “intense investor focus” on its gas turbine order ramp, said a Jefferies analyst.

headline: GE Vernova (GEV): Evaluating Valuation After Recent Share Price Momentum and Analyst Price Target Gap
summary: GE Vernova (GEV) is capturing investor attention lately, especially as its share performance has diverged from some industry peers over the past month. Investors seem to be weighing recent market trends in relation to the company’s ongoing growth story. See our latest analysis for GE Vernova. Despite some recent volatility, GE Vernova’s share price still stands out with a year-to-date gain of nearly 70 percent. The one-year total shareholder return has more than doubled, reaching 106 percent...

headline: Heard on the Street Wednesday Recap: Tech Check
summary: Tech stocks were broadly weaker. The Nasdaq Composite lost 0.9%, and the S&P 500 dropped 0.5%. The Dow Jones Industrial Average shed 334 points, or 0.7%. Netflix shares declined 10%. Its quarterly profit was below expectations, though revenue from its advertising business picked up.
